name: Auto Checkup Simulator
description:
Auto Check Up Simulator: Car Inspection and Driving Simulation



Auto Check Up Simulator is an exciting simulation game that offers realistic car inspection and driving experience. Designed for car enthusiasts, this game allows you to perform vehicle inspections, control the cars, earn money to buy and upgrade vehicles, and manage the economy. With Auto Check Up Simulator, you will have an immersive experience and feel yourself at the heart of the automotive world.

Features:



  • Car Inspection: In the game, you will have the opportunity to perform realistic car inspections. Show your expertise by conducting detailed examinations of components such as the engine, brakes, suspension, and more.

  • Driving Controls: Take control of the vehicles to showcase your driving skills. With realistic driving mechanics, you can skillfully use speed, steering, and other controls to have a perfect driving experience.

  • Earning Money and Vehicle Upgrades: In Auto Check Up Simulator, you can earn money through successful inspections. Use that money to purchase better vehicles and upgrade your existing ones.

  • Economy Management: You will need to manage your finances wisely in the game. Make strategic decisions to balance your budget between purchases, upgrades, maintenance expenses, and other expenditures. Master the art of economic success.

  • Ideal for Time Spent: Auto Check Up Simulator is a game that appeals to car enthusiasts and simulation game fans. Manage your time, conduct car inspections, improve your driving skills, and embark on an unforgettable journey in this automotive world by completing exciting missions.

Auto Check Up Simulator invites you to a real car experience as a game for car enthusiasts. Inspect cars, perfect your driving, build a rich car collection, and make strategic decisions for economic success. Join Auto Check Up Simulator now and enjoy the world of cars!

Minimum System Requirements:
  • Operating System: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Auto Check Up Simulator will captivate you with a real car experience. Buy it now, showcase your inspection skills, and improve your driving abilities!
